name: mikehaertl/phpwkhtmltopdf
description: A slim PHP wrapper around wkhtmltopdf with an easy to use and clean OOP interface

suggest.h4cc/wkhtmltopdf-i386: wkhtmltopdf static linked linux binary for i386 systems.
suggest.h4cc/wkhtmltopdf-amd64: wkhtmltopdf static linked linux binary for amd64 systems.
